item.title: Auto restarter
item.dc:creator: @PKOwner PKOwner
item.description:
@PKOwner wrote:

[quote=“frugoo scape, post:4, topic:41901”]Frugoo Scape tells you:
You can edit the source also. In server.class there is a auto restarter.
Here is mine just change my settings.

[code]import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer == -1)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code][/quote]

Ur dumb right u cant edit class files.
Even if u do ur source will be messed up no offence.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Frugoo Scape tells you:
You can edit the source also. In server.class there is a auto restarter.
Here is mine just change my settings.

[code]import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer == -1)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]
